title: Html5-QRCode Translation Schema
description: JSON Schema for html5-qrcode translation files

codeParseError.description: Error message when QR code parsing fails. Use {error} as placeholder.

errorGettingUserMedia.description: Error message when getting user media fails. Use {error} as placeholder.

onlyDeviceSupportedError.description: Error message when device doesn't support navigator.mediaDevices.

cameraStreamingNotSupported.description: Error message when camera streaming is not supported.

unableToQuerySupportedDevices.description: Error message when unable to query supported devices.

insecureContextCameraQueryError.description: Error message when camera access is attempted in insecure context.

scannerPaused.description: Message displayed when scanner is paused.

scanningStatus.description: Status text when scanning is active

idleStatus.description: Status text when scanner is idle

errorStatus.description: Status text when there is an error

noCameraFoundErrorStatus.description: Status text when no cameras are found

lastMatch.description: Text showing last matched code. Use {decodedText} as placeholder.

cameraPermissionRequesting.description: Text shown while requesting camera permissions

noCameraFound.description: Message when no camera is found

torchOnButton.description: Button text to turn torch on

torchOffButton.description: Button text to turn torch off

torchOnFailedMessage.description: Error message when torch fails to turn on

torchOffFailedMessage.description: Error message when torch fails to turn off

scanButtonScanningStarting.description: Text shown when scanner is starting

textIfCameraScanSelected.description: Text to switch to file scan mode

textIfFileScanSelected.description: Text to switch to camera scan mode

fileSelectionChooseImage.description: Button text to choose an image file

fileSelectionChooseAnother.description: Button text to choose another image

fileSelectionNoImageSelected.description: Text when no image is selected

dragAndDropMessage.description: Message for drag and drop functionality

dragAndDropMessageOnlyImages.description: Message for drag and drop with file type restriction

loadingImage.description: Message shown while loading an image

cameraScanAltText.description: Alt text for camera scan icon

fileScanAltText.description: Alt text for file scan icon
